tier.item: 1) a. Stelpurnar voru mjög kaldar
girls-the (nom. pl.) were (3 pl.) very cool
`The girls were very cool'

girls-the (nom. pl.) were (3 pl.) very cool
`The girls were very cool'

girls-the (nom.pl.) were (3 pl.) very cool

`The girls felt very cold'

somebody (nom.) helped boys-the (dat. pl.) with homework-the
